english.segment1: I don't care anymore. I can't lie to you now. I know I've pushed you too far. I can't turn it around
english.segment2: All I have is wrapped up in you. Don't take it awaytake it away. Anything that I have to do. I'm gonna do to stay
english.segment3: You don't know what you're holding. Til it's taken. You don't know what you're made of. Til you're breaking. And you don't know the fate of one mistake. Til you realize, what you leave behind
english.segment4: I can't talk anymore. My chest hurts when I breathe. This is not what I'd hoped for. I still want to believe
english.segment5: I can feel the pain that I've caused. I'd take it away, take it away. Any price that I have to pay. I'm gonna pay to stay
english.segment6: You don't know what you're holding. Til it's taken. You don't know what you're made of. Til you're breaking. And you don't know the fate of one mistake. Til you realize, what you leave behind
english.segment7: You never know til it's gone. Til it's gone
english.segment8: All I have is wrapped up in you. Don't take it awaytake it away. Anything that I have to do. I'm gonna do to stay
english.segment9: You don't know what you're holding. Til it's taken. You don't know what you're made of. Til you're breaking. And you don't know the fate of one mistake. Til you realize, what you leave behind. You realize, what you leave behind.
